languages.text: "Вы говорите о том, что происходило на Кьяве Гамма, почтенный магос? Я читала о подобном... Но читать и узреть собственными глазами — очень разные вещи".
"Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."
languages.original_text: "Вы говорите о том, что происходило на Кьяве Гамма, почтенный магос? Я читала о подобном... Но читать и узреть собственными глазами — очень разные вещи".

traits.locale_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你指的是基亚瓦伽马星上发生的事情吗，尊敬的贤者？我曾读到过相关的知识……但读到过和亲眼见过，是完全不同的两回事。”
languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

traits.locale_text: “你指的是基亚瓦伽马星上发生的事情吗，尊敬的贤者？我曾读到过相关的知识……但读到过和亲眼见过，是完全不同的两回事。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Feriez-vous référence à l'incident de Kiava Gamma, honorable magos ? Certains livres font référence à de tels événements... Mais j'imagine que le voir de ses propres yeux est sans commune mesure. »
languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

traits.locale_text: « Feriez-vous référence à l'incident de Kiava Gamma, honorable magos ? Certains livres font référence à de tels événements... Mais j'imagine que le voir de ses propres yeux est sans commune mesure. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Se refiere a lo sucedido en Kiava Gamma, estimado magos? Había leído informes de sucesos similares... pero es muy distinto leer algo y verlo con mis propios ojos».
languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se refiere a lo sucedido en Kiava Gamma, estimado magos? Había leído informes de sucesos similares... pero es muy distinto leer algo y verlo con mis propios ojos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマで起きたことを指しているのでしょうか、偉大なマゴスよ？そうした文献を読んだことはあります…ですが、何かを読むことと、己の目で直に見ることは全くの別物です」
languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマで起きたことを指しているのでしょうか、偉大なマゴスよ？そうした文献を読んだことはあります…ですが、何かを読むことと、己の目で直に見ることは全くの別物です」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sprecht Ihr davon, was auf Kiava Gamma geschehen ist, verehrter Magos? Ich habe davon gelesen ... Doch etwas lesen und es mit eigenen Augen sehen, sind verschiedene Dinge."
languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

traits.locale_text: "Sprecht Ihr davon, was auf Kiava Gamma geschehen ist, verehrter Magos? Ich habe davon gelesen ... Doch etwas lesen und es mit eigenen Augen sehen, sind verschiedene Dinge."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'da olanları mı diyorsun saygıdeğer Logis? Benzer durumlara yönelik okumalar yapmıştım. Tabii bir şeyi kitaptan okumak ayrı, kendi gözlerinle görmek ayrı."
languages.original_text: "Are you speaking of what happened on Kiava Gamma, esteemed Magos? I have read of such things... But reading something and seeing it with one's own eyes are very different things."

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama'da olanları mı diyorsun saygıdeğer Logis? Benzer durumlara yönelik okumalar yapmıştım. Tabii bir şeyi kitaptan okumak ayrı, kendi gözlerinle görmek ayrı."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
